p: After collection, the fresh plant material was extracted directly by hydrodistillation with a Clevenger-type apparatus. For this, 750 g of crushed material was extracted for a period of 4 h in 3000 mL of ultrapure water (18.2 MΩ). Then, the obtained EO was extracted three times with chloroform, dried over anhydrous Na 2SO 4 and filtered through a nylon membrane (pore size 0.22 μm, Whatman, Maidstone, UK).
